item.title: The Trade Desk’s Matthew Henick Talks Ventura, the OS Looking to Change the Smart TV Game
item.description: TV buyers will soon have yet another option when weighing what smart TV to purchase. Digital advertising giant The Trade Desk has been developing a new operating system, known as Ventura, which is set
